extension.name: System - Zentester 4 Joomla
extension.author: Tim Robinson
extension.description:
zentester plugin [for Joomla! 1.5.x]

can automatically add the required tracking code to your website, without you having to dig into the coding of your template.

Major Features

  • No More Nerdy HTML or Coding
  • Run multiple tests, simultaneously
  • Save time with easy code implementation

Please visit Zentester to get the latest version.

For questions or support, please check out our support section.

If you enjoy this plugin, please vote on Joomla Extensions Directory!

field.name: zentester_id
field.label: Zentester Test Key
field.description: This is the 16 character test key provided by Zentester on the 'Get Code' page.
